website_summaries.verdict: Great meal powder option for dieters, as it has no added sugar and a limited number of carbs.
pros: Has a chocolate coconut flavor that is a bit different from some other meal replacement powder options
Uses whey protein isolate for a lean type of protein in 20 grams of protein per serving
cons: Carries a higher than average price per ounce

customer_reviews.title: Halved the protein and fat!
customer_reviews.text: They changed the recipe without any warning or info! Less than half the protein and fat.... That's a pretty drastic change! I used this stuff to support a pretty active lifestyle - now it's all about calorie restriction. Not the point! ...and the new recipe doesn't dissolve properly.
customer_reviews.author: Si

customer_reviews.title: Does not mix-white chunks float up to the top
customer_reviews.text: I used the vanilla flavor and didn't have this problem. This is just an issue with the chocolate shake. When I use a blender bottle and ball, these white chunks float to the top and never mix into the shake no matter how long I shake the bottle. I have to chew through my drink. The flavor is good, but after using the vanilla, the texture of the chocolate is a disappointment. I tried to get a refund, however this item isn't eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I actually really liked the taste of this and had high hopes it ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually really liked the taste of this and had high hopes it would work out for me. But it also gave me horrible stomach pains and a general feeling of nausea and edginess. I didn't realize what it was at first, because I just started going to the gym again for the first time in ages and just thought I had pushed myself too hard because I drank the protein shake right after my workout. Nope, it was the shake.
customer_reviews.author: Raven L.

customer_reviews.title: They changed their recipe and it's harder to blend now
customer_reviews.text: I've used the product for several years now and it used to easily dissolve with a shaker and some water. I've received two shipments now and the powder doesn't fully dissolve into water. The result is a chunky shake with white floaties that aren't the most flavorful. I compared the ingredients to a few months ago and indeed there has been a change. Overall the flavor is still good, but the powder isn't easily dissolved and probably requires an a blender from here on out. I'm not convinced I'll be staying with the product anymore after I finish out my last 2 containers.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Formula change?
customer_reviews.text: Did primal kitchen change their formula recently? I’ve been ordering this protein for about 2 years now with no complaints, but my recent order was off. The container looks different, the flavor is different, and the powder is absolutely impossible to mix. It has always been tougher to mix than any other protein powder I’ve tried, but my recent order was way worse. No matter what I do tiny clumps remain & the tweek in flavor does not warrant the trouble anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Askew

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely has a coconut flavor, but it's good. The coconut gives it a slimy kind of texture (as opposed to chalky like other powders), but not in a bad way. It makes it thicker. The flavor is good, but it's got more calories than the other protein powder I use, so I have it less often.
customer_reviews.author: EricaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. Taste is ok, I mostly taste the coconut and not much chocolate. I’ve made this multiple times and am always left with multiple clumps of undissolved powder. I’ve done regular water - - clumps. Hot coffee - - clumps. Coconut milk, shaken, sit for 4 hours , shaken again - - clumps. I’ve even contacted the company about this, but they have not responded to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Tosha DelJanovan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually not a fan of smoothies, shakes, or other meal-replacement options - this applies both to recipes that I make myself or stuff that comes out of a tub. Typically they make me feel bloated, and don't really fill me up like a proper meal would. This product is different, it tastes good, goes down easy, and makes me feel full (in a good way) for 4 hours or so. I use 3 scoops instead of the recommended 2 and add a little almond butter and a few fresh berries for flavor. That works out to about $3.50 per serving, so it's economical too relative to most fast meals to go. I really highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: West999

customer_reviews.title: Great Meal Replacement
customer_reviews.text: One of the best meal replacement combined with the Primal Blueprint I have lost 30 pounds. The price is also less than other similar protein. (Since my fist review price has gone up. The price is the same as the manufacturer)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. SR

customer_reviews.title: Issues with recent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product several times, and all the other times I've really enjoyed it. However, my most recent purchase arrived and when I opened it I found these mysterious white chunks mixed in with the powder (see the photos). I'm not sure what they are, but the don't blend when stirred or shaken and detract from my experience with this product. Some sort of explanation from the manufacturers would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Frankson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive But Good
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to protein for the last year and despite a few small complaints, I can confidently say that this is one of the highest quality products on the market. I like to use this as a replacement for Breakfast and it hasn't let me down in any way at all in the year I've been using it on a daily basis. I'm assuming that the extremely high cost is due to the use of Whey Protein Isolate as the main component, something which most other companies don't do, instead opting for less-efficient Whey Protein Concentrate. One slight issue: the product never fully dissolves or mixes well but that doesn't affect the taste negatively.
customer_reviews.author: OCTILLIN

customer_reviews.title: New formula does not mix well!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this before and loved it. Looks like the formula has changed and now it does not mix and there are chunks that float on top when you blend it. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melknee

customer_reviews.title: Recently terrible
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering this for years and having it for breakfast every morning. Recently the formula must have changed. The last two I got had tons of white chunks that did not mix into the drink. It's pretty gross to be drinking something that should be liquid only to get chunks in your mouth. It's completely turned me away from this product. The first one I got like that I thought it was a fluke, maybe the seal had been broken. Tried one more and same outcome. Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New recipe is unpleasant
customer_reviews.text: I loved the old recipe, it mixed in seconds and was smooth and tasted. I received a new container and unbeknownst to me they changed the recipe. The new recipe does not mix at all and is gritty. I sent a message regarding my concerns and the response I received back was that they removed the soy from the shake and that I should make a paste before shaking. Make a paste?? The whole point of drinking a shake is for ease of use, I shouldn’t have to make a paste to drink a shake. Needless to say I won’t be buying the powder again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Newman

customer_reviews.title: No stomach issues, mixes well, tastes good not sweet.
customer_reviews.text: I use in my blender bottle. Blends fine without leftover clumps. It's best if it's really cold. So I've been putting in the freezer for a bit or just using ice cubes when I'm in a hurry. Taste is ok. Not super sweet so I like it. I mix with unsweetened cashew milk. So far this hasn't given me any belly issues like many proteins do. I will be rebuying again.
customer_reviews.author: SRD

customer_reviews.title: Recent formula change, won’t repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve repurchased this several times. But the recent formula change was unnecessary. There’s less protein and frankly it’s just not as good of a product. I just ordered a different protein powder. The old formula wasn’t ‘broken’, it definitely didn’t need to be ‘fixed.’
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy, sour and not eligible for return
customer_reviews.text: I had a good experience with the collagen powder and thought I’d try this. It says you can mix it with cold or hot water. I made a vanilla, cinnamon turmeric tea and it was terrible. The first time, the powder turned into one giant rubbery clump. The second time, I tried stirring rapidly as I mixed and this was the result. It also smells sour. Apparently it’s not eligible for return. I would understand that if it weren’t rancid. What an expensive waste!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Bought before, but this one is curious
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this before and have loved it. When I opened it this morning to make my shake, I noticed that there was chocolate powder (not surprising), but also white powder. It was as if the coconut flavor or whatever hadn't been mixed in properly. Its odd. It doesn't taste any different from the last one I bought, but it looks like a quality control issue. Not sure who to contact about this or if I should. Will buy again when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, clumpy, no flavor and NON-REFUNDABLE
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! I’ve purchased this before several times and never had an issue. Of course the one time it’s on sale and a great price, there is something wrong with this batch. It’s very clumpy, doesn’t blend and has zero flavor. It’s nothing like the other times I’ve purchased it. It’s not eligible for return or exchange which you would think would be the proper thing to do. Needless to say I will never buy this again and recommend everyone be skeptical about purchasing this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Albers

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED IN 2019, YUCK--RUINED A GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This used to be great. Around January if 2019, they changed it drastically: 1) they removed the soy (ok), 2) changed vanilla from s good vanilla to a really *cheap* vanilla taste (yuck!) 3) cut the amount of protein in half 4) did something so it doesn't dissolve well at all (exit blender bottle, enter electric mixer). I could've dealt with the loss of protein and the poor mixing if it at least still tasted good.
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recipe has changed
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my favorite protein shake but I really don't like the new formula. Its not as smooth. Serving size has changed as well. Used to be 2 scoops but now is 1. Even using 2 I don't love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Different formula, still good.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently there is a new formula, and folks have complained that it doesn’t mix up as well as the old formula. The reviews made me a little nervous, but I have used Primal Fuel previously, and really liked it. I prefer the vanilla flavor. It does take some vigorous mixing to get the little lumps out. I put my liquid into my shaker, add the powder & stir it up, then let it sit for a few minutes before shaking the bejeebers out of it. A stick or regular blender helps. Same good flavor & really fills me up. I’m sold.
customer_reviews.author: Loon Potts

customer_reviews.title: Changes were made seemingly without any testing done
customer_reviews.text: New product mix is not good. Went from having a nice flavor and ready mix to now it tastes like chemicals to me. I'm stuck with it until I can find something better. I used to enjoy mixing this with my cold brew coffee, now I have to use a blender and add something to it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor! I use some cashew milk, banana, and powdered peanut butter (from Costco) and a few ice cubes. It tastes like a milk shake! Soooooo delicious. Not a bit gritty. Wonderful flavor. Keeps me full-no blood sugar crash. Great for taking to work. Buying again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Low value, low protein
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to this based on the name alone and liking some other "Primal" stuff, but was disappointed. First off, $40+ for only 10g a serving of protein is very expensive and second, it does not shake well at all- it loves to clump! The taste of the vanilla is actually pretty good, to me but it just pales in comparison to the cons. Oh, and although I'm not overly snobby on being true paleo, this does not fit that bill either if you look at the ingredients. I'd advise searching around for a better option.
customer_reviews.author: trigga415

customer_reviews.title: Look at the shelf life
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, it is just my last shipment was expired when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Doe

customer_reviews.title: New formula ruined the product
customer_reviews.text: As others have written the new formulation ruined what was a great product. Doesn’t mix well anymore, very clumpy and not suited for a shaker bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Martin

customer_reviews.title: Does not mix well at all - you get gross gooey lumps
customer_reviews.text: This review is specifically for the vanilla coconut. This formula does not mix well at all. Leaves you with globs of gooey lumps. Doesn’t matter if hot or cold drinks. You have to use a high powered blender to dissolve completely. I did not have this problem with the chocolate coconut formula, i went thru 3 jars of that. Thought i would try a new flavor for a change. Unfortunately this type of products are not exchangeable
customer_reviews.author: Eddielicious

customer_reviews.title: New formula just forms clumps
customer_reviews.text: I did love this protein, and I still love their collagen fuel. This bottle would not mix into my coffee. It just clumps and sinks to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Krissa

customer_reviews.title: Multiple bathroom visits!  Horrible stomach pain!
customer_reviews.text: Within 30 minutes I was running to the bathroom. Horrible gas, stomach swelling and diarrhea. Unfortunately it cannot be returned. I’ve only had one other brand effect me this way.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hodge

customer_reviews.title: This Does Not Melt in Hot Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to use this powder up as fast as I can, so I can move on to a better formulas. This doesn’t melt, you will have to break every lump with the back of your spoon. Afterward, you will have to drink your coffee very fast because the powder settles in the bottom and becomes very thick. The taste is fine, it acts as a sweetener to my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great taste
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste and the quality ingredients. Supplements my nutrition very nicely when I need a little extra protein in my day. I did, however, find it quite a bit cheaper on Thrive Market and since I subscribe there, I will order through them from now on. But if you don't have a subscription to T.M. (which you should;)), I do recommend getting here because it's still a good price for the quality product.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaJean

customer_reviews.title: Gritty/ doesn’t blend well
customer_reviews.text: The powder never blended well. I’ve bought this brand and flavor in a smaller container with no issues. This large tube is just terrible. I tried canceling my subscribe and save and I am not allowed to return this product. Now I have two tubs of gritty powder.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal j

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Gives you lots of energy and can ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Gives you lots of energy and can be filling. It's great that it's natural. Tastes great. I wish the price were lower, or they would offer discounts to recurring customers.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: New formula does not mix well
customer_reviews.text: I use a blender bottle + blender ball, half water, half coconut milk. the previous formula was easily shaken into a smooth shake. the new formula is very clumpy, even after vigorous shaking. the taste is still good. i would only recommend this new formula if you are using a powered blender. unfortunately, i will be looking for a new protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Smaller container than advertised, thus price per ounce even higher
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking it was a 2 LB container, as listed. It was a little more expensive than another website but thinking that Prime deliver would have it to me in 2 days I chose to order. Well, the container is 1.86 LB, not 2 as listed. And the shipping was delayed a day. Not very happy about these two things! But I have to admit that this is my favorite protein powder - the taste is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: CCota

customer_reviews.title: Great, but strong coconut taste
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I was making fruit smoothies every morning for breakfast but didn't feel it was enough, so I decided to try to add in some protein powder to keep me fuller longer. This mixes well, no clumps, no harshness to it, and has clean ingredients. The coconut taste was a little overwhelming for me when I Tried to mix it with just water, but others might like it.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Two scoops with one half cup crushed ice, a little water and one cup of frozen peaches in my Ninja blender makes delicious peach "ice cream". I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Texas MiMi

customer_reviews.title: I'm no expert but i like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Really tasty and i feel good about what is on the label. At the risk of sounding superficial, i would like to note that the package states to refrigerate after opening. In my mind that makes this protein powder seem more like food than other brands. I like that it has probiotics and there is no overwhelming artificial sweetener flavor. I would recommend this product. I add a scoop of cacao for the days i want a more choclately flavor without the guilt.
customer_reviews.author: holly B

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this product. The flavor is non existent and if your liquid is too hot the powder will congeal. I am familiar with protien powder but this mouth feel is waxy even though the taste is so thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jmac

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest concern is that the container isn’t completely filled. The picture I added was immediately after opening, the canister wasn’t filled to the top. I’m sure I’ll still get the labeled amount of servings (I will be counting) but for now it’s kind of disappointing to buy a product and have it come 3/4 of the way full. This is decent tasting, it won’t make you gag, but I’d be hard pressed to say its delicious. But that’s really not an issue since I use this as a supplement not as a replacement for food AND it fits in with my paleo/primal food plan.
customer_reviews.author: Toubaboliviano

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is good if you like coconut, but it does not mix well at all unless you use an electric blender.
customer_reviews.author: Byrd's Nest

customer_reviews.title: Gritty, no flavor
customer_reviews.text: Yuck. No flavor, gritty, gross. No staying power, hungry hour later. Would have returned, but after 4th time trying drink it got pushed to back of cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the real stuff?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened, I have been buying the vanilla for years at the store, I decided to order and save myself some time. The product container is only about 2/3 full and it is curdling and chunky in my coffee..... very disappointed. Will not being ordering this product online again, buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Amy Yager

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Protein Powder!
customer_reviews.text: I might be a bit of a taste snob admittedly.. It is so hard to find a protein powder that doesn't taste bitter or have a gross aftertaste. This one is so good! I like to blend with a banana, peanut butter, a little sugar free creamer, ice, and water. Tastes like a milk shake! It also shipped fast. I also looked directly on the website to order, but it was a much better price on here.
customer_reviews.author: Juliann

customer_reviews.title: At first I did not like the coconut/chocolate
customer_reviews.text: At first I did not like the coconut/chocolate, but I have grown to enjoy it. It has low sugar levels, which is what I was looking for as well as 10g protein per scoop. Making my 4HR body challenge achievable.
customer_reviews.author: Bam&Sam

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Down on New Product Formula!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product on auto-ship for years, and have loved it that entire time. Recently however, the new owners of Primal fuel have reformulated it. Now it is chunky, and doesn't mix properly. I'm really hoping they change it back, because I'm likely not going to continue ordering it if they don't.
customer_reviews.author: J. Prazen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t mix well
customer_reviews.text: Must use a blender, it won’t mix the powder both out the power blender. Blender bottles didn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: Change in formulation??????
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few months and loved it and bought the larger size canister and this didn't taste, look or dissolve at all like previously ordered. It wouldn't even dissolve in the hot water and clumped to the top and tasted like milky water. Instead of returning for a refund, I just ordered a replacement hoping that I had just got a bad batch but this is as bad as the last one and now they won't refund my money. Very, Very dissatisfied and will not be purchasing any primal kitchen product again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Burling

customer_reviews.title: I use this with unsweetened almond milk and water and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this with unsweetened almond milk and water and it is so filling! Expensive, for sure, but I have already purchased my second tub.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: BAD!!! My 5th canister
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th time I have ordered this specific collagen powder. All the other times I have loved it: great taste and mixes in to my coffee well. However, this canister seems to be a totally different powder. Does not mix well into anything, no matter how long I blend. The texture in my liquids is like eraser pieces, rubbery and chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: It gave me a horrible stomach ache
customer_reviews.text: This is so gross. It gave me a horrible stomach ache. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Identically designed labels make choosing collagen versus whey powders easy to misidentify!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on subscription thinking this was the collagen one because it is the exact same labeling. When my stomach started reacting differently, I looked closer and saw that there is dairy in this one so look at the labels carefully!
customer_reviews.author: Business Guy

customer_reviews.title: They are slacking on quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this product for over 2 years and the last container I got was chalky tasting, with a white powder in it I am unsure of what it actually is. I noticed it came in a different shaped container than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jared L

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting product!! I have reordered many times. My doctor wants me to get more protein and I took the container to him so he could read all the ingredients- it’s doctor approved!!! My favorite is the vanilla flavor. I blend it with frozen raspberries- delicious 😋 !
customer_reviews.author: twinsmom

customer_reviews.title: High quality protein
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research into what sort of protein powder to use for the occasional smoothie. I eat primarily paleo and limit processed foods so I wanted to be careful about what sort of additives these powders have. My research pointed to Primal Kitchen as a great choice. This protein powder tastes GREAT and has protein and fat for a more balanced smoothie. I usually mix it with a variety of additions like spinach, avocado, or banana, but in a pinch I'll put it in almond milk. I would strongly recommend this over a cheaper grocery store brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Payne Capecchi

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is just ok. Definitely not worth the hefty price tag. I appreciate that it’s paleo, but it’s got a very small hint of coconut and almost nonexistent vanilla flavor (that’s even after adding in vanilla bean flavored collagen and fruit).
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Primal Kitchen makes good product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Primal Kitchen Collagen in place of creamer in my coffee and love it, so, I decided to give the Whey Protein Powder a try and love it to. Primal Kitchen makes really good products. I would recommend their products.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the taste of this. If u like coconut flavor, don’t hesitate. I’ve for to say though, it has to be mixed with milk because it would not work with water. Also, its a little hard to blend. Worth it? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Emmeline. B

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting and gluten/Dairy free.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd container I love this stuff! it tastes great and it is a large container for the money! I am dairy free and gluten free due to an immune decease and this is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this protein powder. I've tried many others and always hated the flavor and aftertaste. Primal Fuel is not gritty, gummy, and it mixes so well-even without a blender. I drink one daily about an hour before a workout. It keeps me full and helps me through a tough workout session. No weird stevia aftertaste either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is the most delicious low carb meal replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is the most delicious low carb meal replacement on the market! It keeps me full and feeling energized. I have both the Chocolate and Vanilla on hand. I just add pumpkin spices to the vanilla and it is a delicious Pumpkin Latte meal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great meal replacement. I’ve been using this since it first came out. The company was sold and I hear that the formula has changed but fortunately this is the old, good batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum, Yum, Bye, Bye Wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Price sucks. Just saying. Best tasting, but kiss your wallet good bye. Don't get me wrong...guy has to pay for his house in CA...so they gotta charge that much. If you find better taste/price - Let me know. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrie7

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this just wasnt for me. I've tried plenty of protein powders/meal replacements and this one I just couldn't stomach. I also had the most difficult time getting the clumps out with a shaker bottle. Its impossible. Theres definitely better tasting, healthier and cheaper options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Mason

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and very filling!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great whey protein. Easy to add fruits and veggies to. I'd like to see it in vanilla but I can only find the collagen one. The chocolate and coconut are a great combo
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W.

customer_reviews.title: Bad stomach issues!
customer_reviews.text: I’m assuming it’s the Stevia? Bad stomach issues after having a shake for breakfast. I can’t return it; boo
customer_reviews.author: BaileyDog

customer_reviews.title: Collagen supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several collagen supplements & this is the only that I consistently use on a daily basis. I thought it would replace my non-sweetened almond milk creamer, but it did not. It really doesn’t have much of a taste. Mixes well in hot coffee, but a small amount will settle to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not really my "cup of protein "
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt blend well since its very clumpy. I totally suggest putting it through a sieve as you mix it in. The taste is okay, definitely not as bad as some protein powders ive had, but it still has that distinct protein taste. Honestly though, drink a cup of milk, it has the same amount of protein as if you put this in a cup of water and it tastes better. This would be great to add to pancakes or other baked goods though!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: ... is a little pricey but in all it taste great with just water
customer_reviews.text: It is a little pricey but in all it taste great with just water, I mix it with a bullet if I am adding a banana and skim milk, otherwise I have been using the 7LMIXX mixing cup that I can charge and it mixes very well no clumps or anything GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Amariles

customer_reviews.title: but I like stevia, so this doesn't bother me
customer_reviews.text: The interpretation of paleo is variable. Getting down to it, this isn't REALLY paleo (dairy), but it's a minimally messed with protein. It is whey protein with fats from coconut. The stevia does have a prominent aftertaste, but I like stevia, so this doesn't bother me. It's super smooth and blends easily. Shook in the blender bottle with some unsweetened almond milk and it came out so smooth. Added this with collagen peptides to my smoothie this morning and love it. Definitely going to reorder and try some other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting protein powder, both the chocolate and vanilla! It also provides a nice thickness to your smoothie. The other brands I've tried (and don't like as much) are BioTrust, Athletic Greens, Spring of Life, Shakeology and Vega (which is not whey.)
customer_reviews.author: StefLBC

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this powder for years and have loved it but I must have gotten a bad batch this time. The powder would not blend and the taste was terrible. The powder looked wet when it arrived and sticky and no matter how many times I tried to blend it would not!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Actually tastes pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Unlike so many powders, this one actually tastes good. It is filling as well. I like both the chocolate coconut and the vanilla coconut. I sometimes add espresso powder to get a latte-like flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. Easy to make. Effective meal replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. Haven’t tried the chocolate but this is very good and I am not a huge fan of protein shakes. Mixes well with berries or fruit in morning. Blends well with nutribullet.
customer_reviews.author: vcm773

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: I've had this in the past and like that its natural and paleo - The most recent tub I got has an awful after taste and tastes like old milk. For the price, I would expect better. The expiration date says its a year from now, but tastes like its expired.
customer_reviews.author: Lela T.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and very good
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying the chocolate after using the vanilla for a few months. My daughter got me this when I was not well and it has helped a lot. I use it to help with general nutrition, as the protein is very high, and it is very easy on the stomach.
customer_reviews.author: BCM Texas

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the chocolate coconut. I mix with a fresh banana, strawberry yogurt, turmeric and fiber and it tastes just like a banana split!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and provides several hours of hunger suppression. Best meal replacement I have tried. Ships fast also!!
customer_reviews.author: Bullmoose

customer_reviews.title: I want to just throw it out
customer_reviews.text: Meant to get the collagen fuel. Tried to feel okay about it anyway, but it only has 10 grams of protein when my other stuff has 25 grams. AND it clumps up so it's like eating chunks in your coffee. Thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: susan montanaro

customer_reviews.title: Useful alone or with almond milk
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd order for this product. I changed my eating habits to exclude sugar. I use this in my coffee to replace dairy flavored creamer. This has had a 2 fold improvement for me... no sugar and improvement in my nails and hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G. McCain

customer_reviews.title: BUFF YUM
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Great taste. Kinda hard to mix... so make sure you have a shaker.
customer_reviews.author: mk3

customer_reviews.title: Good blend.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what sheerness is supposed to mean, but it seems silky smooth. Tasty, I ate the whole thing, will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: The Smith ltd.

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients (although I'd prefer no stevia)
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients (although I'd prefer no stevia), tastes great in smoothies and works well in protein bites. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. One of the best tasting protein powders and is low carb. Kind of a bummer that you increased the packaging size but then when you open it’s only filled 2/3 of the way. Why not just keep the original packaging or reduce. Giving the false impression of more than what you actually get.
customer_reviews.author: Dinosaur47

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like the the healthy stuff in this protein powder. It's not gritty, and tastes good. I mix it with coconut milk, and sometimes use some in my oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: Cellogrl

customer_reviews.title: Great meal replacement shake, for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much I have ordered a 2nd bottle. I found it for about $45.00 the price varies. It works great, lost 2 inches on my waist in the 30 days I was using it. The taste is very light and would be better if you added fruit, however I don't have the time so I just mixed it with water and ice and a shaker bottle and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: giggles

customer_reviews.title: Re-purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought this product for myself and one for my niece. I just purchased it again as a gift for my niece. We both really enjoy the texture and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Janiece Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, use it every morning to add to a shake. Best tasting protein around (chocolate tastes awesome too)
customer_reviews.author: Double D

customer_reviews.title: The driver broke the security of our property
customer_reviews.text: What I don’t like is two times now drivers have come into my backyard to leave the package instead of going to my front door. The last delivery made today he climbed over the locked fence and came up on my back deck to my back door and left the packages. Why doesn’t he just go to my front door and leave the packages? I consider this a security breach on our property for someone to climb over a locked fence.
customer_reviews.author: John Stephen Gay

customer_reviews.title: Best morning addition to my coffee
customer_reviews.text: Use this powder every morning in my coffee. Dissolved fast and is a great substitute for dairy in my coffee with the addition of coconut based protein.
customer_reviews.author: Mydoray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best tasting protein powder around! LOVE IT! Worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: kksmom119

customer_reviews.title: The best protein powder!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to find a more natural protein powder that doesn't have a bunch of junk and additives in but also tastes good and this is it!!!! I love this protein powder. It has good ingredients and nothing artificial. It is also super yummy. I will definitely be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: NCgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Tastes so good! Like you know your protein mix is fire when you look forward to the powdery lumps. This stuff is bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Shalimarism

customer_reviews.title: Chunky
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 3 different shakers and my Ninja blender as well as water and almond milk. No matter what I use there are always chunks. I have tried to like this product but ended up throwing away.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ingredients, Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. I like the fat and protein profile. I was hoping it would make me feel more full with those good fats, but it doesn't seem to fill me up any more than normal protein powder. Fairly expensive, but you pay for the quality of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: No chalky taste and just a slight coconut flavor which is perfect. Although it is slightly pricier than other protein ...
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is delicious! No chalky taste and just a slight coconut flavor which is perfect. Although it is slightly pricier than other protein powders, the flavor is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Has monk fruit
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a bad after taste. Did not realize it had monk fruit in it or I would not have bought it. Monk fruit reacts in the body like sugar so the pancreas reacts.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hensley

customer_reviews.title: It was fine.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product, a little too much stevia flavor, but I adjusted. I just don’t really need it, so probably won’t order again.
customer_reviews.author: Margi Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite protein meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both have used this. Mixes well and tastes great. I appreciate buying from a reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Melissa Shepard

product_meta.title: Primal Kitchen Primal Fuel Chocolate Coconut Whey Protein Powder- Updated Contains No Soy - 10g of Protein, 31.04 oz
product_meta.description:
Flavor:ChocolateWhey to go! Add 10g of whey protein* to your day with primal fuel Protein Powder in creamy chocolate coconut! Keto and paleo friendly and made without gluten or grains, this primal-approved powder helps support lean muscle mass with a full amino acid profile of whey protein isolate. Stir into coffee, or shake into a smoothie for a kick of protein and velvety, chocolate-coconut taste! Cocoa powder and monk fruit extract make this drink mix irresistibly, uncompromisingly delicious! Primal fuel Protein Powder is made with whey, and has 1g of sugar*, so you can go Your own whey. 

*see nutrition facts panel for fat, saturated fat, and cholesterol content.
not a low-calorie food.
feature_bullets: 10G OF PROTEIN* PER SERVING: PRIMAL FUEL Protein Chocolate Coconut Powder includes 10g of whey protein in every serving.
GLUTEN FREE: This whey protein powder is made without grains and is Certified Gluten Free.
PRIMAL APPROVED, KETO AND PALEO FRIENDLY: Shake up your day and keep up the Primal lifestyle or Keto or Paleo meal plan with this PRIMAL FUEL Chocolate Coconut Powder.
MADE WITH COCOA POWDER AND MONK FRUIT EXTRACT: PRIMAL FUEL Chocolate Coconut Powder is made with delicious cocoa powder and monk fruit extract.
1G OF SUGAR* PER SERVING: PRIMAL FUEL Protein Powder contains 1g of sugar. How sweet is that? Not a low-calorie food. *See nutrition facts panel for saturated fat content.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
